UNEPICKID
Basic
Slow Orb

Description: Deals 240-800 true damage to an enemy hero (damage increases with level). This ability has a cooldown of 90 seconds.

Pro Tip: Execute is often used to inflict additional damage on top of burst attack combos, or deliver decisive killing blows. This ability usually targets the enemy hero with the least amount of HP or the one closest to you. Alternatively, you can hold down the ability button for better targeting if thereâ€™s more than one enemy hero within your range.
